## BotNotification.initialize() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Initialize bot notification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static initialize(adapter: BotFrameworkAdapter, options?: BotNotificationOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  adapter | BotFrameworkAdapter | the bound <code>BotFrameworkAdapter</code> |
|  options | [BotNotificationOptions](./teamsfx.botnotificationoptions.md) | initialize options |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

To ensure accuracy, it's recommended to initialize before handling any message.
